sentences.en: A former company executive describes him as the embodiment of Nike's image.
sentences.cn: 公司前行政主管形容乔丹是耐克形象的化身.

sentences.en: A successful job search needs to be as well organized as any other executive task.
sentences.cn: 一次成功的寻职要像任何其他执行任务一样精心安排。

sentences.en: An oil executive swindled £50,000 out of his firm.
sentences.cn: 一名石油公司主管从其公司骗取了5万英镑。

sentences.en: As chief executive, he assembled a polished stable of celebrities.
sentences.cn: 作为首席执行官，他手下云集了一批优雅的名人名士。

sentences.en: At the highest executive levels earnings and performance aren't always correlated.
sentences.cn: 在最高管理层，收入与工作表现并不总是相关的。

sentences.en: Bulletin boards charted each executive's progress.
sentences.cn: 公告牌显示了每个主管人员的工作进展情况。

sentences.en: He also served on the National Front's national executive committee.
sentences.cn: 他还曾就职于民族阵线全国执行委员会。

sentences.en: He is respected as a very aggressive and competitive executive.
sentences.cn: 他是一位锐意进取、竞争意识很强的主管，颇受尊敬。

sentences.en: He is to remain in the hot seat as chief executive.
sentences.cn: 他将继续留在公司总经理这个不好坐的位子上。

sentences.en: He sits on the executive committee that manages Lloyds.
sentences.cn: 他是管理劳埃德保险公司的执行委员会成员。

sentences.en: She took over as chief executive of the Book Trust.
sentences.cn: 她接任书业托拉斯的总裁。

sentences.en: The executive could not alienate any part of our territory.
sentences.cn: 行政官员不能将我们领土的任何部分让给他人.

sentences.en: The most junior executive officer outranked the senior engineer officer aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 在舰船上，级别最低的副舰长也位列级别最高的轮机官之上。

sentences.en: The programme of sell-offs has been implemented by the new chief executive.
sentences.cn: 新任总裁已经执行了抛售方案。

sentences.en: They may headhunt her for the vacant position of Executive Producer.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会挖她去填补执行制片人这一空缺职位。

sentences.en: Today its executive committee voted unanimously to reject the proposals.
sentences.cn: 今天执行委员会投票一致否决了这些提案。

words.tran_cn: 执行，执行程序；主任参谋，副舰长
执行者；[法] 遗嘱执行人
经理；执行委员会；[计]执行者；经理主管人员

phrases.tran_cn: 行政长官；董事长；美国总统；（美国的）州长
行政管理；高级管理层；主管经理管理层
办公室；行政办公室；经理办公室
行政权；执行权；行政管理权
猎头（等于headhunting）；搜寻高级管理人员（的做法）

trans.tran_en: relating to the job of managing a business or organization and making decisions

trans.tran_cn: （公司或机构的）经理，领导层，（政府的）行政部门
trans.tran_en: a manager in an organization or company who helps make important decisions
